entry.title: We Can't See the Skyline
entry.summary:
Author: Rawrbin

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,933Chapters: 19/25Kudos: 748

Summary: Jason Todd is a struggling college student, part-time mechanic, and full-time closeted homosexual, just trying to get by in Park Row. When he needs a roommate in order to pay the bills, fate delivers him Dick Grayson, a charming man with a mysterious past. Jason suspects they may have more in common than they can speak out loud. Will he be able to keep their roommate relationship platonic? And what is Dick Grayson's real history?

entry.title: My little Robin
entry.summary:
Author: VanyKruemelPendragon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 173,877Chapters: 41/56Kudos: 272

Summary: After Robin got kidnapped, ages ago, for the ploy of a love sick Talia, for proposing to Bruce in their twisted way, she'd come to Dick, desperate, alone, pretending to be broken.Dick, just fired as Robin, with a replacement lined up, doesn't believe one word she says, until she starts being honest. Until he sees a way to handle his hurt feelings.Three years later, she's back. Not broken, not quite as desperate, and yet honest, again. Honest how she's afraid of her position as heir to the League, with an actual male heir around. Honest about her wish to get rid of said heir.Dick has no choice, not really. He has to take Damian in. It's his son, after all. Fic is fully written and will be uploaded chapter by chapter. Upload every Wednesday and Sunday. Which means this will be done... December 31st, if I do daily uploads in the Christmas weeks. It'll allow you to read the last chapter, which is set shortly after midnight, on New Year's Day, after midnight ;)

entry.title: Dick bites. It's a problem.
entry.summary:
Author: VanyKruemelPendragon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 81,906Chapters: 21/28Kudos: 367

Summary: Thanks to batsandbirdbrains (Tumblr) it's now my headcanon that Dick bit as Robin.This is a COLLECTION of oneshots, somewhat related around one thing: Dick bites.Mostly Mature for the biting and violence, though the last chapter is PWP (DickJay). “You bite strange men, you get the rinse,” Batman said. “That’s the rule.” Robin tried to twist away, but Batman levered Robin up onto his feet with one hand, the other aiming the peroxide at Robin’s mouth. Robin clamped his lips tight. Batman’s patience snapped. “Open,” he growled. “Now.”“Mh-mh!” Robin kicked, but Batman hoisted him higher, one hand under Robin’s armpit, the other holding his head in place.“You don’t want hepatitis.” Batman said, voice ticking up a notch.Robin stopped struggling, eyes wide. Batman saw the pause, and loosened his grip - only to make Robin wind out of his grip and start running. The man with the bitten arm moaned.“What the fuck is wrong with you?” he managed, voice thick with pain and shock.Robin deadlooped over him, baring his teeth in a wicked, blood-stained grin.“Don’t grab the Robin,” he said. “That’s the first lesson.” Fully written fic, upload every Wednesday and Sunday!

entry.title: You're Gonna Take It From Me (I'm Gonna Give It To You)
entry.summary:
Author: Starless_Void

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,611Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 107

Summary: Jason makes his way back to Gotham about a year after his big fight with Bruce. He hunkers down in a new apartment, staying as far under the radar as possible to avoid any contact with the Bats- who would probably throw him in Arkham the first chance they got. If only that were his only problem. On top of staying out of the attention of the most paranoid people on the planet, Jason is trying to find a way to undo a stupid spell that has left him in a rather strange state. Returning to Gotham is probably up there in the stupidest decisions he's ever made, but it's his home too. As long as he lays low, doesn't rebuild his criminal empire, and keeps to himself, there shouldn't be any reason for the Bats to bother him.   Dick Grayson has lost Jason twice now. There won't be a third.

entry.title: Shot Through the Heart
entry.summary:
Author: SaviouroftheStars

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,158Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 75

Summary: Jason Todd died once. It didn’t stick. Now a revenant with a stuttering heartbeat and a soul that won’t stay buried, he hunts the things that crawl out of the dark. But nothing he’s fought—not demons, not ghosts, not monsters wearing human skin—comes close to the pair now stalking the hunter circuit. They’re carving through veteran hunters like wheat. One is a towering brute in a mask.The other is a beautiful, shackled young man whose presence feels like gravity—quiet, strange, and impossible to ignore. Every instinct Jason has screams danger. Something about him feels ancient, bound, wrong. And yet Jason can’t look away. He’s going to have to kill them both. He just wishes the pretty one wasn’t making the job so damn complicated.

entry.title: retroreflector
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,633Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 57

Summary: [Tim catches the movement the instant it happens and then watches, pulse hitching, as Jason leans in—slow, lazy, the kind of movement that really should only happen in private, behind closed doors, not just out of sight enough from the Wayne Enterprises Scholarship fundraiser happening three floors below—and breathes in the smoke spilling from Dick’s lips. The burning ember flares, casting a stark, molten outline over the few inches of space between their mouths. For one suspended moment, it illuminates nothing but hunger. Tim swallows. Hard. Pretends that he’s never seen that expression in the mirror.] or, Tim Drake is perfectly content to be a voyeur, watching Dick and Jason unravel each other on a shadowed balcony at a Wayne Enterprises fundraiser—from a careful five feet and four inches away.
